Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • acoadd - Image coaddition using Lucy Method with optional acceleration.
  • plucy - Multiple channel photometric image restoration.
  • redshift - Tasks for determining redshifts and dispersions.
  • specfit - Nonlinear fitting for 1-D images and spectra using simplex
  • or Levenberg-Marquardt method.
  • vla - Spectral image reduction for VLA data.

  • (Type "help contrib opt=sys" for more information about the contrib package).
